text: Ri Jesús xok bꞌik pa ri Templo, xeꞌresaj loq konojel ri winaq ri tajin kakikꞌayij xuqujeꞌ tajin kakiloqꞌ aꞌwaj rech ri sipanik. Xuwolqotij bꞌik ri kimexa ri kꞌexol taq pwaq, xuqujeꞌ ri tajin keꞌkikꞌayij palomax.21:12 Ri aꞌwaj ri kekꞌayix pa ri templo are waꞌ ri ketzuj cho ri Dios. Ri pwaq ri kakꞌex pa ri templo are waꞌ ri pwaq ri xwi pa ri templo kariqitaj wi. E kꞌi man xtzꞌaqatisax ta ri kirajil rumal man sukꞌ ta kenoꞌjin ri e kꞌexol taq re.
